instructions.1: Spread one side of each slice of bread with honey mustard and the other side with margarine.
instructions.2: Top the honey mustard side of 4 bread slices with 2 slices of turkey, 2 apple slices, and 2 slices cheese. Cover with second slice of bread, mustard facing cheese.
instructions.3: Place a large skillet over medium heat until hot, add sandwiches and cook until bread is golden, about 4 minutes. Turn and grill second side of sandwiches.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the bread from Step 1 being used?
Is bread from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is bread from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is honey mustard live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the bread in Step 2?
Can we top (Step 2) and place (Step 3) at the same time?
